title: Remote.co Jobs Scraper Input
description: Extract remote job listings from Remote.co with customizable search options.

startUrl.title: Search URL
startUrl.description: Remote.co search URL to scrape. If provided, keyword and location will be ignored.
startUrl.sectionDescription: Paste a Remote.co search URL directly

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job title, skill, or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Marketing').
keyword.sectionDescription: Or search by keyword and location

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter by location. Leave empty for worldwide remote jobs.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect.
results_wanted.sectionDescription: Control how many results to collect

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to process.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.sectionDescription: Configure proxy for better success rates
